p: The gene expression analysis of MYB1 and MYB4 orthologous genes show that the corresponding expression levels are clearly different between ZS11 and ZY821 cultivars. In particular, there is a remarkable increase in the expression level of the MYB1 orthologous genes BnaC03g63160D during the late stage after flowering in the ZY821 cultivar (>day 15) (see Figure 9). Another interesting pattern has been observed for the MYB4 orthologous gene BnaA08g16990D: While its expression level increases until day 15 after flowering in ZY821 cultivar, it sharply decreases at the late stage (day 45) (see Figure 10).
